com.codepotato.controller

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.codepotato.controller.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends
    FileManager class is sued for saving and loading the recorded audio files. Also can convert & export raw audio files to wav in its own thread by calling execute() on a FileManager instance.
    Author:
    Steven Senatori

      Retrieves the recorded raw files

    • Method Detail

      • deleteFile

        public boolean deleteFile(java.io.File audioFile)
        Deletes the raw audio file and its corresponding wav file (if it exists)
        Parameters:
        audioFile - File object
        Returns:
        boolean True if deletion was succesful

      • getRawFiles

        public java.io.File[] getRawFiles(Context appContext)
        Retrieves the recorded raw files
        Parameters:
        appContext - an instance of the Application context. Can be retrieved by Context.getApplicationContext in a GUI Activity Class via this.getApplicationContext.
        Returns:
        File[] an array of File objects

      • listRawFiles

        public java.lang.String[] listRawFiles(Context appContext)
        Retrieves a String based list of the raw file's names
        Parameters:
        appContext - the applications context. can be retrieved from an Activity via this.getApplicationContext
        Returns:
        String[] list of raw file names
